name: 齊世緯
objective:
本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
Course Description
The aim of the course is primarily to prepare students with English knowledge by leading them to do wide-range reading.
The course will, therefore, focus on reading.  The reading materials incorporate articles selected from different sources such as the textbook of “Six-Way Paragraphs (Middle Level)”, English newspapers and magazines, etc.  The format of the course will combine lecture, discussion, and a little writing, 2 hours per week.  Requirements include a few quizzes, a mid-term examination and a final examination.
